channel.title: TOASTMASTERS on Pavan Kemparaju
channel.description: Recent content in TOASTMASTERS on Pavan Kemparaju

item.title: Toastmaster Ice breaker speech
item.description: This is my ice breaker speech - the speech meant as an introduction - at Advanta Toastmasters. Ice breaker 4/31/2019 This is my icebreaker speech. I’d like to introduce a man with a lot of charm, talent, and wit. Unfortunately, he couldn’t be here today, so instead … This is the speech where you get to know me, so let’s begin. Most of “how tos” and tips for ice breakers said that I should start of with a bombshell.
